title: Tsukiyo No Groumet
alternative_title: 月夜のグルメ ; Moonlit Groumet
status: 月夜のグルメ ; Moonlit Groumet
description:
Description :
        Late at night, Sakura goes on a food adventure with his father's notebook. Guided by the moonlight, she arrives at his destination in the evening - a story about sake, food, and family by Outarou Maijou.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Night 3 - Fathers And The Sports Festival
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Night 1 - The Notebook Groumet
